name: Words to Remember
description:
Words to Remember is a story-driven language learning game where you travel to a new country and learn from the new friends you make there.

  • Explore and interact with locals during the day, and recall what you learned in your dreams
  • Remember sentences from colorful dialogs
  • Form bonds with the characters you meet and gradually find your new place to belong 

Learn French, German, Japanese, Chinese (Mandarin) or Korean

Words to Remember is still a prototype, so note that some text is machine translated (and may have mistakes), and the voices are machine generated (and may sound unnatural).
